definition: (military) a secret agent hired by a state to obtain information about its enemies or by a business to obtain industrial secrets from competitors, secretly collect sensitive or classified information
details:
noun
- (military) a secret agent hired by a state to obtain information about its enemies or by a business to obtain industrial secrets from competitors
= synonyms: undercover agent
- a secret watcher
verb
- secretly collect sensitive or classified information
- watch, observe, or inquire secretly
= synonyms: stag
- catch sight of
= synonyms: spot
- catch sight of
= synonyms: spot
